languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении Маражай словно бы невзначай поворачивает голову, демонстрируя ваше клеймо на своей шее.{/n} "Как я могу служить тебе, {name}?"
{n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении Маражай словно бы невзначай поворачивает голову, демонстрируя ваше клеймо на своей шее.{/n} "Как я могу служить тебе, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando te acercas, Marazhai gira la cabeza con evidente indiferencia, mostrándote la marca de su cuello.{/n} «¿En qué puedo servirte, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te acercas, Marazhai gira la cabeza con evidente indiferencia, mostrándote la marca de su cuello.{/n} «¿En qué puedo servirte, {name}?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}当你走近时，玛拉斋故作冷淡地转过头，露出了脖子上的烙印。{/n}“我该怎么服侍你，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}当你走近时，玛拉斋故作冷淡地转过头，露出了脖子上的烙印。{/n}“我该怎么服侍你，{name}？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくと、マラズハイはわざと無造作に頭を振り、首にある焼き印を見せつける。{/n}「何か御用ですかな、{name}？」
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくと、マラズハイはわざと無造作に頭を振り、首にある焼き印を見せつける。{/n}「何か御用ですかな、{name}？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}À votre approche, Marazhai tourne la tête avec une nonchalance délibérée pour révéler la marque sur son cou.{/n} « En quoi puis-je vous être utile, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}À votre approche, Marazhai tourne la tête avec une nonchalance délibérée pour révéler la marque sur son cou.{/n} « En quoi puis-je vous être utile, {name} ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, dreht Marazhai auffällig unauffällig den Kopf zur Seite, um das Brandmal an seinem Hals zu zeigen.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, dreht Marazhai auffällig unauffällig den Kopf zur Seite, um das Brandmal an seinem Hals zu zeigen.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, ?"

languages.text: {n}Sen yaklaşırken Marazhai, soğukkanlılıkla başını çevirip boynundaki damgayı gösteriyor.{/n} "Nasıl hizmet edebilirim {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, Marazhai turns his head with deliberate nonchalance to reveal the brand on his neck.{/n} "How can I serve you, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen yaklaşırken Marazhai, soğukkanlılıkla başını çevirip boynundaki işareti gösteriyor.{/n} "Nasıl hizmet edebilirim {name}?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
